''[https://static.tp-link.com/2018/201811/20181109/Archer%20T3U(EUUS)_V1_180724_Mac.zip Mac OS X 10.9-10.13]'' |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (slave), 23dBm (EIRP), |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/10/2019 |estreldate = 04/29/2019 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B07LGMD97Z |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B07M69276N |asin_country2 = GB |asin3 = B07M69276N |asin_country3 = AU |asin4 = |asin_country4 = |multirev = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[TP-LINK]] ''Archer'' T3U V1, USB 3.0, 802.11ac, 2.4/5GHz, :23dBm (EIRP), 40.5 x 19.72 x 10.29 mm, 90.7 g {{See also|TP-LINK Archer T series|TP-LINK Archer T3U Plus|TP-LINK}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.tp-link.com/au/home-networking/adapter/archer-t3u/ Product Page] (AU) *[https://www.tp-link.com/uk/home-networking/adapter/archer-t3u/#specifications Spec.] (UK) *[https://www.tp-link.com/my/support/download/archer-t3u/#Driver Support page] (MY) ===USB ID (2357:012d) references=== * [https://github.com/cilynx/rtl88x2BU_WiFi_linux_v5.3.1_27678.20180430_COEX20180427-5959/issues/2 ''TP-Link T4U v3'' issue @ ''cilynx/rtl88x2BU'' on '''GitHub'''] * [https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu/blob/master/os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c ''os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c'' @ ''jeremyb31/rtl8822bu'' Linux driver on '''GitHub'''] ==Pictures==
